name: Color Crash Gold Edition
description:
Color Crash is an exciting 2D game where you navigate through levels by tilting your phone and collecting same-colored blocks to increase your score. Tap the the screen in the selected areas to switch colors. Levels begin to increase in difficulty with a higher a score. Dodge different the blocks that are not the same color as you are or you will COLOR CRASH!

This a fun game for anyone to play. Let's see what your high score can be!

The GOLD VERSION is AD-Free and includes added levels making it more fun and challenging.

94 Total Levels!
